publicationStmt.authority: Centre for Computing in the Humanities, King's College London

availability.p: All reuse or distribution of this work must contain somewhere a link back to the URL http://inslib.kcl.ac.uk/

div.head: Editorial team
div.p: Charlotte Roueché continued and standardised the editing, adding bobliography and tranlations: ORCID
Catherine Dobias-Lalou provided significant editorial assistance: VIAF
Hafed Walda provided geodata and illustrations:
Gabriel Bodard oversaw the digitisation and the construction of the publication; ORCID
